Text: Scott Derrickson (born July 16, 1966) is an American director, screenwriter and producer.

Ist das Ihr Fahrrad, Mr. O'Brien?

--------------------
Text: Ist das Ihr Fahrrad, Mr. O'Brien?:  is a German biographical radio play about life, works and legacy of Irish modernist writer Brian O'Nolan (Irish: "Brian Ó Nualláin" ; 5 October 1911 – 1 April 1966).
Triplets:<Brian O'Nolan
